title: Aquarius is SO not disco.

subtitle: Here’s the thing: this song has always bugged me. Aquarius, to me, is muted jazz, midnight labs, soft shadows, the lonely ivory tower. This track is none of that. It’s pure pop joy &#82‚Ä¶
